golden_diagnosis: 全身型重症肌无力/Generalized myasthenia gravis; GMG/Myasthenia gravis/Myasthenia gravis,全身型重症肌无力/Generalized myasthenia gravis; GMG/Myasthenia gravis/Myasthenia gravis,全身型重症肌无力/Generalized myasthenia gravis; GMG/Myasthenia gravis/Myasthenia gravis
predict_diagnosis:
1. Myasthenia gravis
2. Lyme disease
3. Neuromyelitis optica (NMO)
4. Multifocal motor neuropathy (MMN)
5. Chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyradiculoneuropathy (CIDP)
6. Guillain-Barré syndrome (GBS)
7. Mitochondrial disease
8. Hereditary motor and sensory neuropathy (HMSN)
9. Vitamin B12 deficiency
10. Idiopathic intracranial hypertension (IIH)

Please note that this list is not exhaustive, and further evaluation and testing will be necessary to narrow down the final diagnosis. These top 10 diagnoses encompass a variety of conditions that can cause symptoms related to the patient's phenotype. It is essential to consider other rare and common neurological disorders, and the list may vary depending on the clinical context and geographical region.
